identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Imperfection is Human.

headings.usage: All section titles, card headers, and hero text. Use tight tracking.

body.usage: Paragraphs, inputs, labels, and list items.

colors.strategy: Archetype 3: Pastel & Soft with Neo-Brutalist Twist
colors.twist: Use high-contrast black borders (2px) and hard shadows to prevent the pastels from looking 'washed out'. The UI should feel like a sticker book.

textures.noise_overlay: Use a fixed noise opacity of 0.03 on top of solid colors to add paper feel.

rules: Avoid perfect symmetry. Rotate elements slightly (-1deg to 1deg) on hover.
Use 'Masonry' style layouts for the gift feed.
Containers should look like physical cards or polaroids.
layout_strategy.spacing: Generous. Use p-6 or p-8 for cards. Gap-6 for grids.

buttons.classes: rounded-full border-2 border-black bg-primary text-white font-bold px-6 py-3 shadow-[2px_2px_0px_0px_#000000] hover:translate-y-1 hover:shadow-none transition-all active:translate-y-1

cards.classes: bg-white border-2 border-black rounded-xl p-6 shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#000000] hover:-rotate-1 transition-transform duration-300

inputs.classes: border-2 border-black rounded-lg px-4 py-3 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-accent focus:ring-offset-2 focus:outline-none font-medium bg-white

micro_interactions: Hover: Slight rotation or scale up (1.02)

setup: Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the 'Confetti Pop' colors and 'Fredoka' font family.
Add the Google Font link to 'index.html' or 'index.css'.
implementation_rules: DO NOT use default Shadcn styling. Override it with the 'Visual Enhancers' defined above.
Use the 'hard' shadow class (shadow-[4px_4px_0px_0px_#000000]) on all main containers.
Ensure the background has the dot pattern defined in 'textures'.
For the 'Kid Profile', make it look like a trading card.
Use 'sonner' for toasts, but style them with black borders.
universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients for backgrounds; use solid colors or patterns.
Make it fun! Add emojis in text labels if appropriate (e.g., 'Add Gift üéÅ').
